name: Gemrocks
description:
NOTE: This is a 1-level,  very basic, absolutely buggy, demo game that I made as a birthday gift for my little sister! The character is 100% inspired by a clay (hard playdough...foam?) alien she made, and I loved the design so much, that I decided to create a game for her. 

Since I forgot to start the game until a few days before her birthday, yeah...this is pretty rushed. But, I'll work on the game some more after her birthday, so If you enjoy it, great!

HOW TO PLAY

  • This is an HTML5, browser game.
  • Use the Left, Right to MOVE.
  • Use the Down arrow key to JUMP DOWN from certain platforms.
  • Use the Spacebar key to JUMP, and hold down to FLOAT in the air! 
  • THE "ABOUT" & "NEXT LEVEL" BUTTONS DO NOT WORK. They are there because it still needs to be working eventually.

CREDITS

Art/Design/Animation: Bloomzeye (Me) 

RoKo character design: My little sister

Music bought from Fred Patry because I don't make tunes: https://fredpatry-music-composer.itch.io/

Fonts (I customized them to my liking, but originally bought from VEXED  because I didn't want to concept art it with my wacky timeframe): https://v3x3d.itch.io/formal-future

Game Engine: GDevelop
